thread.title: AnnaLynne McCord Reveals She Was Raped In Her Home By A Friend As A Teenager
thread.title_full: AnnaLynne McCord Reveals She Was Raped In Her Home By A Friend As A Teenager

author: Ellie Woodward
title: AnnaLynne McCord Reveals She Was Raped In Her Home By A Friend As A Teenager
text:
She explained: I was on the show 90210 and my storyline took a turn. The producers asked me to portray a rape victim. I said, “Yes, this is such an important topic.” And I did months and months of episodes. I was in to a second season of the storyline when I had a moment on set and what happened came back to me in a flash.
ID: 10670658 10. McCord concluded by urging fellow survivors to not let society dictate or silence their experiences. She said:
You have a voice. Don’t put yourself in a box. Don’t let the polite lies of society silence you.
ID: 10670432 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Ellie Woodward is a senior celebrity reporter for BuzzFeed and is based in London.
